sentence.Network_en: He was full of jocularity and savoir-faire.
He was renowned throughout the diplomatic world for his savoir faire.
sentence.Network_cn: 他在外交界以灵活应变而闻名遐迩.

sentence.Network_en: He was admired for his savoir - vivre and entertaining anecdotes.
sentence.Network_cn: 他因精通人情世故及善于讲有趣的轶事而被人仰慕.
